item.title: US auto safety regulator closes probe into GM's Cruise robotaxis
item.description: The NHTSA said the Office of Defects Investigation has determined that Cruise vehicles were involved in 10 crashes and four of them resulted in injury of vulnerable road users, after analyzing hard braking data from 7,632 incidents commanded by Cruise's automated driving system.

item.title: EV battery-testing centre in B’luru soon
item.description: The facility, for which Union consumer affairs minister Pralhad Joshi laid foundation stone on Thursday, will come up on one acre at the National Test House (NTH), on the Regional Reference Standard Laboratory campus in Jakkur. This cutting-edge testing facility will help South Indian EV manufacturers, especially with regard to ascertaining battery efficiency, safety standards, and meeting performance metrics.

item.title: South Korea Battery Plant Rushed Production Before Deadly Fire, Police Say
item.description: The fire, one of the country’s worst industrial disasters in recent years, happened as the factory was rushing to fulfill a military contract, the authorities said.

item.description:
